about_the_game:
No doomsday apocalypse is complete without ethically questionable scientists and a research facility full of bad ideas. Composer Joel Steudler brings you four tracks of retro-nostalgic synth music to set the stage for whatever gruesome grotesqueries the unchained hubris of science gone wrong can cook up. Also, an uneasy atmosphere and SFX mix... what are they working on?!

Contents:

- 4 BGM tracks suitable for a secret science facility
- 1 apocalyptic atmosphere for ambient dread
- 1 SFX mix for unwise experiments
- .ogg and .m4a formats included.

Terms of Use:

This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
OK to be used in Commercial projects
Contents can be edited
OK for use in games with gore
OK for use in adult-rated games
